name: Shitty Ninja Warriors 7: Genesis (GMTK Game Jam 2022)
name_original: Shitty Ninja Warriors 7: Genesis (GMTK Game Jam 2022)
description:
My first Game Jam! I think it came out pretty nice, In this game you play as four (literally) shitty ninjas that swap their powers randomly, it's a puzzle-platformer, the game contains 10 levels, and... I think that's it!

Music used in game:
Gwinn - Shizuka Theme
Gwinn - Vampire Jonathan
Terraria Nihilus Theme (My Remix)

Be sure to also check out my other projects:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbFrHKlmonF7Ig77YfvzpfQ
